text: Hey everyone, I got access to the LinkedIn Marketing Developer Platform and wrote a script for retrieving basic profile info using Rlinkedin, but it's giving me a 404 error. Does anyone  know any other method I can use to retrieve the basic profile info using Linkedin's API?
